subject: bong rip followed by a kumquat
body:
1\. bong rip followed by a kumquat. finishing a joint before eating a cara cara orange popsicle deborah made. we have the liquid left over from macerated strawberries in the fridge. whipped cream made in a large glass jar with an immersion blender and the right amount of powdered sugar. 

2\. they delivered a huge pile (six cubic yards) of mulch to what i learned is called the apron (the area between the sidewalk and the street) of our driveway which we will shovel and wheelbarrow to the backyard to cover the gaps near the fence around the periphery where all the plants used to be

3\. i learned that in imovie on ipad (which i use to make short music videos of beats i make) the slider for adjusting track volume isn't just totally broken but you have to hold it and then move your finger very very slowly and then it's perfect that's what she said
normalized_markdown:

2\. they delivered a huge pile (six cubic yards) of mulch to what i learned is called the apron (the area between the sidewalk and the street) of our driveway which we will shovel and wheelbarrow to the backyard to cover the gaps near the fence around the periphery where all the plants used to be

3\. i learned that in imovie on ipad (which i use to make short music videos of beats i make) the slider for adjusting track volume isn't just totally broken but you have to hold it and then move your finger very very slowly and then it's perfect that's what she said
